title.rendered: ROKANE – BROWN – DINING TABLE AND 6 CHAIRS

excerpt.rendered:
Make gatherings memorable with this 7-piece modern farmhouse dining room set with an extension table and six upholstered chairs. Punctuated with a cross buck trestle base and extension leaf to accommodate more guests, the table with rough-sawn plank texturing and warm brown finish is sure to impress come mealtime. The chairs keep things cozy with a light brown textured fabric and comfortably cushioned seats lined with nail-head trim.

product details:

Table:

  • Extended Table size (H30 inches, W42 inches, L 66 inches)
    Width: 3.5 fit
    Length 5.5fit
    Height: 2.5fit

Chair:

  • Includes 6 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
